content:
The GPU Technology Conference by NVIDIA is open for registration. GTC takes places October 5-9, 2020, and is a must attend digital event for developers, researchers, engineers, and innovators looking to enhance their skills, exchange ideas and gain a deeper understanding of how AI will transform their work. GTC serves as a platform for the latest breakthroughts in AI, HPC, graphics and data science.

And it costs only 49 us dollars. 10 dollars off (39) if you use the following code: NVJUANJ

https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/gtc/

The event includes presentations in English, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean and Chinese.

Looking forward to see you there, JJ

GTC Oct 2020: Deep Learning & AI Conference
The world's biggest and most important AI and Deep Learning conference.
